pages.text: Antique parchments describe a wet and bouncy mushroom called $(o)Gliophorus psittacinus$() that excretes a slimy substance. Unfortunately, it seems to have died out a long time ago.
This mushroom consists of multiple slimy stems and caps with a lime color.
The caps of adult Parrot Waxcap excrete small drops of a slimy substance that can be harvested.

pages.title: Jump Boost
pages.text: It is not edible but the bouncyness of the Parrot Waxcap allows you to make potions and tipped arrows of leaping from them.
